inputs.mainInformation: On this page, you can edit the data that was specified during registration. You can change the name of the organization, add or change media links, phone number of the organization, etc.

organizationName.label: Full name of the organization
organizationName.information: In Ukrainian (in accordance with the Charter)

certificateOfRegister.label: Certificate of entry into the register
certificateOfRegister.information: To download a document, click on the paperclip icon or the “Download document” field. Format jpg, jpeg, png or pdf. Maximum size 5 MB.

dateOfRegisterOrganization.label: Date of registration of the organization

positionOrganization.label: Position of the organization's representative
positionOrganization.forExample: For example: Manager, IA, Accountant, etc.

positionOfMember.label: Position
positionOfMember.information: Enter the role of the employee (accountant, driver, etc.) or leave the field blank

email.label: Representative's e-mail address (e-mail)
email.information: This email address will be your login. You will receive an email to the specified email address regarding the results of processing your registration request.

socialNetworks.label: Link to the social network
socialNetworks.information: Add links to social media - no more than 5. (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Youtube, etc.).

checkbox.information: I agree to the processing of personal data in accordance with the

avatar.information: Add an image or leave it blank and we will automatically add the first letters of your first and last name. Max size 5 MB. Format jpg, jpeg, png.

successfulRegistration.title: Thank you for registering!
successfulRegistration.firstPartText: After verification of your data (within 48 business hours), you will receive an email to the specified email address
successfulRegistration.secondPartText: with a login and password. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us!

validation.taxNumber: Tax number must contain exactly 8 Arabic numerals.
validation.domain: Domain must be correct format www.example.com
validation.passwordMismatch: The entered passwords do not match

board.emptyBoard: There is no board with your participation on this page yet

title.thirdPart: for the needs of non-governmental organizations

cards.firstCardText: It combines all key processes into one integrated platform, enabling you to manage resources, time, and finances more efficiently.
cards.secondCardText: From project planning to financial management and reporting, our product provides everything you need to make your organization successful.
cards.thirdCardText: It will help non-governmental organizations optimize processes, improve resource management, and reach new heights in their activities.

forNGOs.title: Designed specifically for the needs of non-governmental organizations

firstCard.title: Process integration
firstCard.text: Combine all important processes into one platform to improve coordination and productivity.

secondCard.title: Ease of use
secondCard.text: Intuitive interface that does not require special technical knowledge.

thirdCard.title: Efficiency
thirdCard.text: Reduce time spent on administrative tasks and optimize resource utilization.

fourCard.title: Adaptability
fourCard.text: Easily customizable to meet the specific needs of your organization.

fiveCard.title: Security.
fiveCard.text: High level of data protection to ensure confidentiality and reliability.

sixCard.title: Support and training
sixCard.text: Our team provides technical support and training for users to use the system.

keyAdvantages.title: key benefits for each member of the organization

firstAccordion.title: Director of a non-governmental organization
firstAccordion.text: The ERP system provides a complete overview of the organization's activities, helping the director to make strategic decisions based on up-to-date data. Control over resources and easy access to information about the budget, finances, and other resources allows you to optimize their use. The ability to monitor productivity, tools for assessing team performance and project efficiency help to achieve the set goals.

secondAccordion.title: Financial manager
secondAccordion.text: Control over budgeting and reporting ERP system provides automated financial management, report generation and expense monitoring to ensure transparency and accuracy in financial activities. In cost optimization: analytical tools help identify and reduce unnecessary costs. In payment control, there is a simplification of invoice and payment processing, which reduces errors and improves financial discipline.

thirdAccordion.title: Project manager
thirdAccordion.text: For the Project Manager, the ERP system will help plan and manage projects by providing tools for effective project planning, monitoring, and execution. For team coordination, it provides the ability to track tasks and deadlines, ensuring effective collaboration within the team, as well as tools for analyzing project results to help improve their efficiency and achieve better results.

fourAccordion.title: Employees
fourAccordion.text: The intuitive interface makes it easy for employees to learn the system and use its functions effectively. In optimizing workflows, task automation allows you to focus on more important and creative aspects of work. Access to the necessary information and tools in one place helps to increase the efficiency of tasks.

fiveAccordion.title: Members of the Board of Directors
fiveAccordion.text: In terms of transparency and accountability, an ERP system provides access to up-to-date information about the organization's activities. Data-driven decision-making: analytical tools help to make informed decisions based on detailed reports and data analysis. It also provides the ability to track progress in achieving the organization's strategic goals.

sixAccordion.title: Volunteers
sixAccordion.text: In the area of easy volunteer participation in non-governmental organizations, the ERP system provides: tools that help manage volunteers, easily attract new participants and coordinate their activities. In convenient communication, integrated communication tools simplify information exchange and coordination. Recognition and appreciation of volunteers' contributions through the system helps to keep them motivated and engaged.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subTitle: Heading 1 for subparagraphs
privacyPage.introText: We greatly value your trust and are committed to ensuring the reliable protection of your confidential information. This Privacy Policy outlines in detail how we collect, use, transfer, and store your personal data while you use our ERP system. We strive to maintain transparency in all of our actions related to your data and guarantee that all processes adhere to the highest standards of security and privacy. Our system is designed with cutting-edge information security technologies to prevent unauthorized access to your data. We use a comprehensive approach to security, including both technical and organizational measures, to ensure the protection of your personal data at every stage of its processing. We understand how important it is for you to know what data is being collected, for what purposes it is used, and who has access to it. This document will explain in detail how we manage your information and what steps you can take to protect your data or correct any errors. We also provide you with the ability to control your data and privacy rights, ensuring maximum control on your part. Whether you are a new user or an experienced client, we are always committed to providing you with a safe and comfortable experience while using our system. Should you have any questions or need additional clarification, our support team is always available to assist you. We are happy to help you navigate all aspects of protecting your data.
privacyPage.list:
1. Collection of Information.
2. We may collect the following types of personal information.
3. We collect information from the following sources.
4. Data that you provide directly when registering or using the system.
5. Automatic data collection through the use of cookies and similar technologies.
6. Use of Information.
7. We use your data to.
8. Providing and maintaining the functionality of the ERP system.
privacyPage.informationDetails: We highly appreciate your trust. {link} And undertake to provide reliable protection for your Our system is designed with advanced information security technologies in mind to prevent unauthorized access to your data. We use a comprehensive approach to security, including both technical and organizational measures, to ensure that your personal data is protected at every stage of its processing. We understand how important it is for you to know what data is collected, for what purposes it is used and who has access to it. In this document, we will explain in detail how we manage your information and what steps you can take to protect your data or correct any errors. We also give you the ability to manage your data and privacy rights, which guarantees maximum control on your part. Whether you're a new user or an experienced customer, we're always committed to providing you with a safe and comfortable experience with our system. If you have any questions or need additional explanations, you can always contact our support team. We will be happy to help you understand all aspects of protecting your data.

cardsTitle.contactDatabase: contact database of donors, volunteers, and partners
cardsTitle.reporting: automatic reporting for audit and donors

financialAccounting: reducing the risk of errors in financial reporting
donationProcessing: integration with payment systems to automate online fundraising
organizationEvents: management of events from planning to reporting
management: access to budget, financial reports, control over donations, grants, and expenses
management of volunteers and employees (list, work schedules, access levels)
inventory and distribution of equipment, humanitarian aid, inventory management
coordination: monitoring task status, deadlines, and responsibilities
creating new projects, setting goals, resources, and key performance indicators
access to internal chats and document sharing systems for quick coordination
reportingAndAnalytics: Automated reports: generation of monthly or annual reports for donors and partners
Analytics: analysis of project success, financial flows, volunteer efficiency
Activity history: access to the archive of all actions, reports, and results of previous campaigns
accessManagement: User rights control: assigning roles and access levels to other employees (e.g., administrator or project coordinator)
Data security: setting security policies, control over information confidentiality
strategic: Future campaign modeling: assessment of resources and potential impact of future projects
Scenario planning: risk analysis and development of action plans for crisis situations
transparency: Transparency: creation of open reports for the public or donors
Feedback: collecting responses from volunteers, benefactors, and aid recipients through built-in surveys or questionnaires
office: Volunteer profile: view and edit personal data, experience, skills, interests, and project participation history
Participation schedule: access to the schedule of tasks and events registered for
Access to resources: view instructions, materials, or documents necessary for task execution
participationProjects: List of active projects: view available initiatives, detailed task and need information
Task registration: sign up for participation in a specific project or event (e.g., distribution of humanitarian aid, logistics)
Priority areas: select activity spheres according to personal preferences (education, ecology, medicine, IDP assistance, etc.)
communication: Built-in chat: communication with project coordinators and other volunteers
Project updates: receive notifications about changes, new tasks, or important events
Feedback: opportunity to ask questions to coordinators or leave suggestions
progress: Task completion reports: submission of brief reports or photo evidence of completed work
Contribution overview: access to participation statistics (work hours, number of completed tasks, assistance within projects)
Receiving recommendations: the system can suggest new projects based on volunteer activity
training: Training materials: access to video tutorials, training sessions, or guides to help volunteers develop their skills
Webinars and events: ability to register for workshops or meetings to improve qualifications
FAQ and help: quick access to answers to typical questions or support from coordinators
interaction: Organization evaluation: leaving feedback about projects or coordination
Recognition program: participation in a motivation system (e.g., receiving certificates, awards, recognition)
Community: opportunity to join groups or forums to share experiences
donorAccount: access to budget, financial reports, control over donations, grants, and expenses
management of volunteers and employees (list, work schedules, access levels)
inventory and distribution of equipment, humanitarian aid, inventory management
donations: monitoring task status, deadlines, and responsibilities
creating new projects, setting goals, resources, and key performance indicators
access to internal chats and document sharing systems for quick coordination

Analytics: analysis of project success, financial flows, volunteer efficiency
Activity history: access to the archive of all actions, reports, and results of previous campaigns
informing: User rights control: assigning roles and access levels to other employees (e.g., administrator or project coordinator)
Data security: setting security policies, control over information confidentiality
processAutomation: Future campaign modeling: assessment of resources and potential impact of future projects
Scenario planning: risk analysis and development of action plans for crisis situations
integration: Transparency: creation of open reports for the public or donors
Feedback: collecting responses from volunteers, benefactors, and aid recipients through built-in surveys or questionnaires
